actionPack.name: Liquibase
actionPack.description: Integration actions for Liquibase, the database versioning tool.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

inputParamList.name: Liquibase jar file
inputParamList.description: The path to the Liquibase jar file.  This is often in the root folder of the Liquibase download, and called liquibase.jar.

inputParamList.name: JDBC Driver Path
inputParamList.description: The path to the JDBC Driver file for the target database.

inputParamList.name: Change Log Path
inputParamList.description: The path to the Liquibase Change Log.

inputParamList.name: URL
inputParamList.description: The URL to the target database.

inputParamList.name: Username
inputParamList.description: The username for the target database for authentication.

inputParamList.name: Password
inputParamList.description: The password for the target database for authentication.

inputParamList.name: JDBC Driver Class Name
inputParamList.description: The class name of the JDBC Driver (so that Liquibase can register the driver).

inputParamList.name: Options
inputParamList.description: Any additional options that should be included on the command line for the execution of this command.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.

scripts.content: java -jar ${Liquibase jar file} --driver=${JDBC Driver Class Name} --classpath=${JDBC Driver Path} --changeLogFile=${Change Log Path} --url="${URL}"  --username=${Username} --password=${Password} ${Options} Validate
scripts.name: LiquibaseValidate1415263795979.bat

scripts.content: java -jar ${Liquibase jar file} --driver=${JDBC Driver Class Name} --classpath=${JDBC Driver Path} --changeLogFile=${Change Log Path} --url="${URL}"  --username=${Username} --password=${Password} ${Options} Validate
scripts.name: LiquibaseValidate1415263795987.sh
